workflow.name: Assistant for Hubspot Chat using OpenAi and Airtable
workflow.description:
This workflow will allow you to use OpenAI Assistant API together with a chatting platform. This version is configured to work with Hubspot, however, the Hubspot modules can be replaced by other platform and it will work similarly. 

## Prerequisites: 
- Create a Hubspot Chat (Live chat available on free plan) or Chatflow (paid hubspot only) and configure it to send all replies toward an n8n webhook (you need to create a custom app for that. I will create a separate article on how to do it, meanwhile, feel free to message me if you need support. 

## Setup:
- Create a OpenAI Assistant, define its functionality and functions
- Update the Hubspot modules with the Hubspot API Key
- Update the OpenAI modules with OpenAI API Key
- Create an Airtable or any other database where you keep a reference between the thread id in Hubspot and Assistant API

If you need help deploying this solution don't hesitate to email  [me](mailto:tsocaci@makeitfuture.eu/) or schedule a call [here.](https://meetings.hubspot.com/makeitfuture/tiberiu-makeitfuture-xcal) 

![CleanShot 20240420 at 16.23.15.png](fileId:789)

parameters.content:
Watch for new message on the chatbot. 
This can be triggered with [n8n chat widget](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@n8n/chat), hubspot or other chat services.
Post assistant Message back to chat service, in this case Hubspot
Create a new Thread, save it to database and RUN

Search for Thread ID in a database. 

This database is maintaing references between messaging service thread id and OpenI Thread ID.
POST a new message to existing thread.

Get Run Status:
If still in progress, run again. 
If action needed go to respective action.
If Completed, post message.

Run required actions based on Assistant answer and respond to Assistant with the function answer. 

Each route is a function that you need to define inside your assistant configuration.

user.name: Tiberiu S - Makeitfuture.com
user.bio: Tiberiu is the CEO of Makeitfuture, a leading nocode agency in Europe and worldwide. They specialize in Nocode automation and work with platforms such as Airtable to help companies optimize their business processes. Makeitfuture customizes, integrates, and develops business solutions to ensure maximum efficiency and ROI.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
